```diff
+ import GPUtil
+ import time
+ import subprocess
+ import threading
+ import pandas as pd
+ import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
+ import matplotlib.font_manager as fm

+ import wmi
+ import os
+ import sys

+ # æ—¥æœ¬èªãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ³ãƒˆè¨­å®š
+ plt.rcParams['font.family'] = ['DejaVu Sans', 'Hiragino Sans', 'Yu Gothic', 'Meiryo', 'Takao', 'IPAexGothic', 'IPAPGothic', 'VL PGothic', 'Noto Sans CJK JP']

+     page_title="VRç’°å¢ƒã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ ç›£è¦–ãƒ€ãƒƒã‚·ãƒ¥ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰",

+ if 'monitoring_data' not in st.session_state:

+         'timestamps': [],

+         'cpu_temp': [],

+         'vram_usage': [],

+

+ class VRSystemMonitor:
+     def __init__(self):
+         self.wmi_connection = None
+         try:
+             self.wmi_connection = wmi.WMI(namespace="root\\OpenHardwareMonitor")
+         except:
+             try:
+                 self.wmi_connection = wmi.WMI(namespace="root\\LibreHardwareMonitor")
+             except:
+                 self.wmi_connection = None
+ 
+     def get_cpu_temperature(self):
+         """CPUæ¸©åº¦ã‚’å–å¾—"""
+         try:
+             if self.wmi_connection:
+                 temperature_infos = self.wmi_connection.Sensor()
+                 for sensor in temperature_infos:
+                     if sensor.SensorType == 'Temperature' and 'CPU' in sensor.Name:
+                         return round(sensor.Value, 1) if sensor.Value else None
+             
+             # ä»£æ›¿æ–¹æ³•: psutil (Linux/ä¸€éƒ¨Windows)
+             if hasattr(psutil, "sensors_temperatures"):
+                 temps = psutil.sensors_temperatures()
+                 if temps:
+                     for name, entries in temps.items():
+                         if 'cpu' in name.lower() or 'core' in name.lower():
+                             return round(entries[0].current, 1) if entries else None
+             
+             return None
+         except Exception as e:
+             return None
+ 
+     def get_gpu_info(self):
+         """GPUæƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—"""
+         try:
+             gpus = GPUtil.getGPUs()
+             if gpus:
+                 gpu = gpus[0]  # æœ€åˆã®GPUã‚’ä½¿ç”¨
+                 return {
+                     'usage': round(gpu.load * 100, 1),
+                     'temperature': round(gpu.temperature, 1),
+                     'vram_used': round(gpu.memoryUsed, 1),
+                     'vram_total': round(gpu.memoryTotal, 1),
+                     'vram_usage_percent': round((gpu.memoryUsed / gpu.memoryTotal) * 100, 1),
+                     'name': gpu.name
+                 }
+             return None
+         except Exception as e:
+             return None
+ 
+     def get_system_info(self):
+         """ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ æƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—"""
+         try:
+             # CPUä½¿ç”¨ç‡
+             cpu_usage = psutil.cpu_percent(interval=1)
+             
+             # ãƒ¡ãƒ¢ãƒªä½¿ç”¨ç‡
+             memory = psutil.virtual_memory()
+             memory_usage = memory.percent
+             
+             # CPUæ¸©åº¦
+             cpu_temp = self.get_cpu_temperature()
+             
+             # GPUæƒ…å ±
+             gpu_info = self.get_gpu_info()
+             
+             return {
+                 'cpu_usage': cpu_usage,
+                 'cpu_temp': cpu_temp,
+                 'memory_usage': memory_usage,
+                 'memory_used_gb': round(memory.used / (1024**3), 1),
+                 'memory_total_gb': round(memory.total / (1024**3), 1),
+                 'gpu_info': gpu_info,
+                 'timestamp': datetime.now()
+             }
+         except Exception as e:
+             st.error(f"ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ æƒ…å ±å–å¾—ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: {e}")
+             return None
+ 
+     def check_vr_processes(self):
+         """VRé–¢é€£ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ã‚¹ã®çŠ¶æ…‹ç¢ºèª"""
+         vr_processes = {
+             'VRChat': False,
+             'VirtualDesktop.Streamer': False,
+             'VirtualDesktop.Service': False,
+             'SteamVR': False,
+             'OculusClient': False
+         }
+         
+         try:
+             for proc in psutil.process_iter(['pid', 'name']):
+                 proc_name = proc.info['name']
+                 
+                 if 'VRChat' in proc_name:
+                     vr_processes['VRChat'] = True
+                 elif 'VirtualDesktop.Streamer' in proc_name:
+                     vr_processes['VirtualDesktop.Streamer'] = True
+                 elif 'VirtualDesktop.Service' in proc_name:
+                     vr_processes['VirtualDesktop.Service'] = True
+                 elif 'vrserver' in proc_name or 'SteamVR' in proc_name:
+                     vr_processes['SteamVR'] = True
+                 elif 'OculusClient' in proc_name:
+                     vr_processes['OculusClient'] = True
+                     
+         except Exception as e:
+             st.error(f"ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ã‚¹ç¢ºèªã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: {e}")
+             
+         return vr_processes
+ 
+     def restart_virtual_desktop(self):
+         """Virtual Desktopã‚’å†èµ·å‹•"""
+         try:
+             # Virtual Desktop Streamerã®ãƒ‘ã‚¹ã‚’æ¢ã™
+             vd_paths = [
+                 r"C:\Program Files\Virtual Desktop Streamer\VirtualDesktop.Streamer.exe",
+                 r"C:\Program Files (x86)\Virtual Desktop Streamer\VirtualDesktop.Streamer.exe",
+                 os.path.expanduser(r"~\AppData\Local\Virtual Desktop Streamer\VirtualDesktop.Streamer.exe")
+             ]
+             
+             vd_path = None
+             for path in vd_paths:
+                 if os.path.exists(path):
+                     vd_path = path
+                     break
+             
+             if vd_path:
+                 # Virtual Desktopã‚’èµ·å‹•
+                 subprocess.Popen([vd_path], shell=True)
+                 return True
+             else:
+                 st.error("Virtual Desktop StreamerãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“")
+                 return False
+                 
+         except Exception as e:
+             st.error(f"Virtual Desktopå†èµ·å‹•ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: {e}")
+             return False
+ 
+ def update_monitoring_data():
+     """ç›£è¦–ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’æ›´æ–°"""
+     monitor = VRSystemMonitor()
+     system_info = monitor.get_system_info()
+     vr_processes = monitor.check_vr_processes()
+     
+     if system_info:
+         # ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
+         st.session_state.monitoring_data['timestamps'].append(system_info['timestamp'])
+         st.session_state.monitoring_data['cpu_usage'].append(system_info['cpu_usage'])
+         st.session_state.monitoring_data['cpu_temp'].append(system_info['cpu_temp'])
+         st.session_state.monitoring_data['memory_usage'].append(system_info['memory_usage'])
+         st.session_state.monitoring_data['vr_processes'].append(vr_processes)
+         
+         if system_info['gpu_info']:
+             st.session_state.monitoring_data['gpu_usage'].append(system_info['gpu_info']['usage'])
+             st.session_state.monitoring_data['gpu_temp'].append(system_info['gpu_info']['temperature'])
+             st.session_state.monitoring_data['vram_usage'].append(system_info['gpu_info']['vram_usage_percent'])
+         else:
+             st.session_state.monitoring_data['gpu_usage'].append(0)
+             st.session_state.monitoring_data['gpu_temp'].append(0)
+             st.session_state.monitoring_data['vram_usage'].append(0)
+         
+         # å¤ã„ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’å‰Šé™¤ï¼ˆæœ€æ–°100ä»¶ã®ã¿ä¿æŒï¼‰
+         max_data_points = 100
+         for key in st.session_state.monitoring_data:
+             if len(st.session_state.monitoring_data[key]) > max_data_points:
+                 st.session_state.monitoring_data[key] = st.session_state.monitoring_data[key][-max_data_points:]
+ 
+ def auto_recovery_check():
+     """è‡ªå‹•å¾©æ—§ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯"""
+     if not st.session_state.auto_recovery_enabled:
+         return
+     
+     monitor = VRSystemMonitor()
+     vr_processes = monitor.check_vr_processes()
+     
+     # Virtual Desktop StreamerãŒåœæ­¢ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹å ´åˆ
+     if not vr_processes['VirtualDesktop.Streamer']:
+         st.warning("ğŸ”„ Virtual Desktop StreamerãŒåœæ­¢ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚è‡ªå‹•å¾©æ—§ã‚’è©¦è¡Œä¸­...")
+         if monitor.restart_virtual_desktop():
+             st.success("âœ… Virtual Desktop Streamerã‚’å†èµ·å‹•ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+         else:
+             st.error("âŒ Virtual Desktop Streamerã®å†èµ·å‹•ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+ 
+ def create_performance_chart(data_key, title, color, unit=""):
+     """ãƒ‘ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒãƒ£ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’ä½œæˆ"""
+     if not st.session_state.monitoring_data['timestamps']:
+         return None
+     
+     fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 4))
+     
+     timestamps = st.session_state.monitoring_data['timestamps']
+     values = st.session_state.monitoring_data[data_key]
+     
+     # Noneã‚„ç„¡åŠ¹ãªå€¤ã‚’é™¤å¤–
+     valid_data = [(t, v) for t, v in zip(timestamps, values) if v is not None and v != 0]
+     
+     if valid_data:
+         times, vals = zip(*valid_data)
+         ax.plot(times, vals, color=color, linewidth=2, marker='o', markersize=3)
+         ax.fill_between(times, vals, alpha=0.3, color=color)
+     
+     ax.set_title(title, fontsize=14, fontweight='bold')
+     ax.set_ylabel(f"{unit}", fontsize=12)
+     ax.grid(True, alpha=0.3)
+     ax.tick_params(axis='x', rotation=45)
+     
+     # Yè»¸ã®ç¯„å›²è¨­å®š
+     if data_key in ['cpu_usage', 'memory_usage', 'gpu_usage', 'vram_usage']:
+         ax.set_ylim(0, 100)
+     elif data_key in ['cpu_temp', 'gpu_temp']:
+         ax.set_ylim(0, 100)
+     
+     plt.tight_layout()
+     return fig
+ 
+ # ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ç”»é¢
+ def main():
+     st.title("ğŸ¥½ VRç’°å¢ƒã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ ç›£è¦–ãƒ€ãƒƒã‚·ãƒ¥ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰")
+     st.markdown("---")
+     
+     # ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ‰ãƒãƒ¼è¨­å®š
+     with st.sidebar:
+         st.header("âš™ï¸ ç›£è¦–è¨­å®š")
+         
+         # ç›£è¦–é–‹å§‹/åœæ­¢
+         if st.button("ğŸ”„ ç›£è¦–é–‹å§‹" if not st.session_state.monitoring_active else "â¹ï¸ ç›£è¦–åœæ­¢"):
+             st.session_state.monitoring_active = not st.session_state.monitoring_active
+         
+         # è‡ªå‹•å¾©æ—§è¨­å®š
+         st.session_state.auto_recovery_enabled = st.checkbox(
+             "ğŸ”§ Virtual Desktopè‡ªå‹•å¾©æ—§", 
+             value=st.session_state.auto_recovery_enabled

+         
+         # ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚¯ãƒªã‚¢
+         if st.button("ğŸ—‘ï¸ ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚¯ãƒªã‚¢"):
+             for key in st.session_state.monitoring_data:
+                 st.session_state.monitoring_data[key] = []
+             st.success("ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ã‚¯ãƒªã‚¢ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+         
+         st.markdown("---")
+         st.header("ğŸ“Š ç›£è¦–é …ç›®")
+         st.markdown("""
+         - **CPUä½¿ç”¨ç‡ãƒ»æ¸©åº¦**
+         - **ãƒ¡ãƒ¢ãƒªä½¿ç”¨ç‡**
+         - **GPUä½¿ç”¨ç‡ãƒ»æ¸©åº¦**
+         - **VRAMä½¿ç”¨ç‡**
+         - **VRé–¢é€£ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ã‚¹**
+         """)
+     
+     # ç›£è¦–ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿æ›´æ–°
+     if st.session_state.monitoring_active:
+         update_monitoring_data()
+         auto_recovery_check()
+     
+     # ç¾åœ¨ã®ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ çŠ¶æ…‹è¡¨ç¤º
+     monitor = VRSystemMonitor()
+     current_info = monitor.get_system_info()
+     vr_processes = monitor.check_vr_processes()
+     
+     if current_info:
+         # ãƒ¡ãƒˆãƒªã‚¯ã‚¹è¡¨ç¤º
+         col1, col2, col3, col4 = st.columns(4)
+         
+         with col1:
+             st.metric(
+                 "CPUä½¿ç”¨ç‡", 
+                 f"{current_info['cpu_usage']:.1f}%",
+                 delta=None
+             )
+             if current_info['cpu_temp']:
+                 st.metric(
+                     "CPUæ¸©åº¦", 
+                     f"{current_info['cpu_temp']:.1f}Â°C",
+                     delta=None
+                 )
+         
+         with col2:
+             st.metric(
+                 "ãƒ¡ãƒ¢ãƒªä½¿ç”¨ç‡", 
+                 f"{current_info['memory_usage']:.1f}%",
+                 delta=None
+             )
+             st.metric(
+                 "ãƒ¡ãƒ¢ãƒªä½¿ç”¨é‡", 
+                 f"{current_info['memory_used_gb']:.1f}GB / {current_info['memory_total_gb']:.1f}GB",
+                 delta=None
+             )
+         
+         with col3:
+             if current_info['gpu_info']:
+                 gpu_info = current_info['gpu_info']
+                 st.metric(
+                     "GPUä½¿ç”¨ç‡", 
+                     f"{gpu_info['usage']:.1f}%",
+                     delta=None
+                 )
+                 st.metric(
+                     "GPUæ¸©åº¦", 
+                     f"{gpu_info['temperature']:.1f}Â°C",
+                     delta=None
+                 )
+         
+         with col4:
+             if current_info['gpu_info']:
+                 gpu_info = current_info['gpu_info']
+                 st.metric(
+                     "VRAMä½¿ç”¨ç‡", 
+                     f"{gpu_info['vram_usage_percent']:.1f}%",
+                     delta=None
+                 )
+                 st.metric(
+                     "VRAMä½¿ç”¨é‡",

+                     delta=None
+                 )
+     
+     st.markdown("---")
+     
+     # VRé–¢é€£ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ã‚¹çŠ¶æ…‹
+     st.header("ğŸ® VRé–¢é€£ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ã‚¹çŠ¶æ…‹")
+     
+     process_cols = st.columns(5)
+     process_names = ['VRChat', 'VirtualDesktop.Streamer', 'VirtualDesktop.Service', 'SteamVR', 'OculusClient']
+     
+     for i, (col, process_name) in enumerate(zip(process_cols, process_names)):
+         with col:
+             status = vr_processes.get(process_name, False)
+             status_text = "ğŸŸ¢ å®Ÿè¡Œä¸­" if status else "ğŸ”´ åœæ­¢ä¸­"
+             st.metric(process_name, status_text)
+     
+     # Virtual Desktopæ‰‹å‹•å†èµ·å‹•ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³
+     if st.button("ğŸ”„ Virtual Desktopæ‰‹å‹•å†èµ·å‹•"):
+         if monitor.restart_virtual_desktop():
+             st.success("âœ… Virtual Desktop Streamerã‚’å†èµ·å‹•ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+         else:
+             st.error("âŒ Virtual Desktop Streamerã®å†èµ·å‹•ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+     
+     st.markdown("---")
+     
+     # ãƒ‘ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒãƒ£ãƒ¼ãƒˆ
+     if st.session_state.monitoring_data['timestamps']:
+         st.header("ğŸ“ˆ ãƒ‘ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹å±¥æ­´")
+         
+         # CPUé–¢é€£
+         col1, col2 = st.columns(2)
+         with col1:
+             cpu_chart = create_performance_chart('cpu_usage', 'CPUä½¿ç”¨ç‡', '#FF6B6B', '%')
+             if cpu_chart:
+                 st.pyplot(cpu_chart)
+         
+         with col2:
+             cpu_temp_chart = create_performance_chart('cpu_temp', 'CPUæ¸©åº¦', '#4ECDC4', 'Â°C')
+             if cpu_temp_chart:
+                 st.pyplot(cpu_temp_chart)
+         
+         # ãƒ¡ãƒ¢ãƒª
+         memory_chart = create_performance_chart('memory_usage', 'ãƒ¡ãƒ¢ãƒªä½¿ç”¨ç‡', '#45B7D1', '%')
+         if memory_chart:
+             st.pyplot(memory_chart)
+         
+         # GPUé–¢é€£
+         col3, col4 = st.columns(2)
+         with col3:
+             gpu_chart = create_performance_chart('gpu_usage', 'GPUä½¿ç”¨ç‡', '#96CEB4', '%')
+             if gpu_chart:
+                 st.pyplot(gpu_chart)

+             gpu_temp_chart = create_performance_chart('gpu_temp', 'GPUæ¸©åº¦', '#FFEAA7', 'Â°C')

+                 st.pyplot(gpu_temp_chart)

+         if vram_chart:
+             st.pyplot(vram_chart)
+     
+     # è‡ªå‹•æ›´æ–°
+     if st.session_state.monitoring_active:
+         time.sleep(2)
+         st.rerun()
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     main() 
```

ã•ã‚‰ã«ã€Virtual Desktopè‡ªå‹•å¾©æ—§æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’å¼·åŒ–ã—ãŸãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚°ãƒ©ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ï¼š

```diff
- 
+ import psutil
+ import subprocess
+ import time
+ import os
+ import sys
+ import logging
+ from datetime import datetime
+ from tqdm import tqdm
+ 
+ # ãƒ­ã‚°è¨­å®š
+ logging.basicConfig(
+     level=logging.INFO,
+     format='%(asctime)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s',
+     handlers=[
+         logging.FileHandler('vr_auto_recovery.log', encoding='utf-8'),
+         logging.StreamHandler(sys.stdout)
+     ]
+ )
+ 
+ class VRAutoRecoveryService:
+     def __init__(self):
+         self.check_interval = 30  # 30ç§’é–“éš”ã§ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
+         self.recovery_attempts = {}
+         self.max_recovery_attempts = 3
+         self.recovery_cooldown = 300  # 5åˆ†é–“ã®ã‚¯ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³
+         
+         # Virtual Desktop Streamerã®ãƒ‘ã‚¹å€™è£œ
+         self.vd_paths = [
+             r"C:\Program Files\Virtual Desktop Streamer\VirtualDesktop.Streamer.exe",
+             r"C:\Program Files (x86)\Virtual Desktop Streamer\VirtualDesktop.Streamer.exe",
+             os.path.expanduser(r"~\AppData\Local\Virtual Desktop Streamer\VirtualDesktop.Streamer.exe")
+         ]
+         
+         self.vd_path = self.find_virtual_desktop_path()
+         
+     def find_virtual_desktop_path(self):
+         """Virtual Desktop Streamerã®ãƒ‘ã‚¹ã‚’æ¢ã™"""
+         for path in self.vd_paths:
+             if os.path.exists(path):
+                 logging.info(f"Virtual Desktop Streamer found: {path}")
+                 return path
+         
+         logging.warning("Virtual Desktop StreamerãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“")
+         return None
+     
+     def check_process_running(self, process_name):
+         """æŒ‡å®šã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ã‚¹ãŒå®Ÿè¡Œä¸­ã‹ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯"""
+         try:
+             for proc in psutil.process_iter(['pid', 'name']):
+                 if process_name.lower() in proc.info['name'].lower():
+                     return True
+             return False
+         except Exception as e:
+             logging.error(f"ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ã‚¹ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: {e}")
+             return False
+     
+     def get_vr_processes_status(self):
+         """VRé–¢é€£ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ã‚¹ã®çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’å–å¾—"""
+         processes = {
+             'VRChat': self.check_process_running('VRChat'),
+             'VirtualDesktop.Streamer': self.check_process_running('VirtualDesktop.Streamer'),
+             'VirtualDesktop.Service': self.check_process_running('VirtualDesktop.Service'),
+             'SteamVR': self.check_process_running('vrserver') or self.check_process_running('SteamVR'),
+             'OculusClient': self.check_process_running('OculusClient')
+         }
+         return processes
+     
+     def restart_virtual_desktop(self):
+         """Virtual Desktopã‚’å†èµ·å‹•"""
+         if not self.vd_path:
+             logging.error("Virtual Desktop Streamerã®ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“")
+             return False
+         
+         try:
+             # æ—¢å­˜ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ã‚¹ã‚’çµ‚äº†
+             for proc in psutil.process_iter(['pid', 'name']):
+                 if 'VirtualDesktop.Streamer' in proc.info['name']:
+                     proc.terminate()
+                     proc.wait(timeout=10)
+             
+             time.sleep(2)
+             
+             # Virtual Desktopã‚’èµ·å‹•
+             subprocess.Popen([self.vd_path], shell=True)
+             logging.info("Virtual Desktop Streamerã‚’å†èµ·å‹•ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+             return True
+             
+         except Exception as e:
+             logging.error(f"Virtual Desktopå†èµ·å‹•ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: {e}")
+             return False
+     
+     def should_attempt_recovery(self, process_name):
+         """å¾©æ—§ã‚’è©¦è¡Œã™ã¹ãã‹ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯"""
+         current_time = time.time()
+         
+         if process_name not in self.recovery_attempts:
+             self.recovery_attempts[process_name] = {
+                 'count': 0,
+                 'last_attempt': 0
+             }
+         
+         attempt_info = self.recovery_attempts[process_name]
+         
+         # ã‚¯ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³æœŸé–“ä¸­ã‹ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
+         if current_time - attempt_info['last_attempt'] < self.recovery_cooldown:
+             return False
+         
+         # æœ€å¤§è©¦è¡Œå›æ•°ã«é”ã—ã¦ã„ãªã„ã‹ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
+         if attempt_info['count'] >= self.max_recovery_attempts:
+             # 1æ™‚é–“çµŒéã—ãŸã‚‰ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’ãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆ
+             if current_time - attempt_info['last_attempt'] > 3600:
+                 attempt_info['count'] = 0
+             else:
+                 return False
+         
+         return True
+     
+     def record_recovery_attempt(self, process_name):
+         """å¾©æ—§è©¦è¡Œã‚’è¨˜éŒ²"""
+         current_time = time.time()
+         
+         if process_name not in self.recovery_attempts:
+             self.recovery_attempts[process_name] = {
+                 'count': 0,
+                 'last_attempt': 0
+             }
+         
+         self.recovery_attempts[process_name]['count'] += 1
+         self.recovery_attempts[process_name]['last_attempt'] = current_time
+     
+     def monitor_and_recover(self):
+         """ç›£è¦–ã¨è‡ªå‹•å¾©æ—§ã®ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ—"""
+         logging.info("VRè‡ªå‹•å¾©æ—§ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã‚’é–‹å§‹ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+         
+         try:
+             while True:
+                 processes = self.get_vr_processes_status()
+                 
+                 # Virtual Desktop Streamerã®ç›£è¦–ã¨å¾©æ—§
+                 if not processes['VirtualDesktop.Streamer']:
+                     if self.should_attempt_recovery('VirtualDesktop.Streamer'):
+                         logging.warning("Virtual Desktop StreamerãŒåœæ­¢ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚å¾©æ—§ã‚’è©¦è¡Œä¸­...")
+                         
+                         if self.restart_virtual_desktop():
+                             logging.info("âœ… Virtual Desktop Streamerã®å¾©æ—§ã«æˆåŠŸã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+                         else:
+                             logging.error("âŒ Virtual Desktop Streamerã®å¾©æ—§ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+                         
+                         self.record_recovery_attempt('VirtualDesktop.Streamer')
+                     else:
+                         logging.info("Virtual Desktop Streameråœæ­¢ä¸­ï¼ˆå¾©æ—§ã‚¯ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³æœŸé–“ï¼‰")
+                 
+                 # ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ã‚¹çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’ãƒ­ã‚°ã«è¨˜éŒ²
+                 running_processes = [name for name, status in processes.items() if status]
+                 if running_processes:
+                     logging.info(f"å®Ÿè¡Œä¸­ã®VRãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ã‚¹: {', '.join(running_processes)}")
+                 
+                 # é€²è¡ŒçŠ¶æ³è¡¨ç¤º
+                 for i in tqdm(range(self.check_interval), desc="æ¬¡å›ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã¾ã§", leave=False):
+                     time.sleep(1)
+                 
+         except KeyboardInterrupt:
+             logging.info("VRè‡ªå‹•å¾©æ—§ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã‚’åœæ­¢ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+         except Exception as e:
+             logging.error(f"äºˆæœŸã—ãªã„ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: {e}")
+ 
+ def main():
+     print("ğŸ¥½ VRç’°å¢ƒè‡ªå‹•å¾©æ—§ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹")
+     print("=" * 50)
+     print("Virtual Desktopã®è‡ªå‹•å¾©æ—§ã‚’ç›£è¦–ã—ã¾ã™")
+     print("åœæ­¢ã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯ Ctrl+C ã‚’æŠ¼ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„")
+     print("=" * 50)
+     
+     service = VRAutoRecoveryService()
+     
+     if not service.vd_path:
+         print("âŒ Virtual Desktop StreamerãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“")
+         print("Virtual DesktopãŒã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‹ç¢ºèªã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„")
+         input("Enterã‚­ãƒ¼ã‚’æŠ¼ã—ã¦çµ‚äº†...")
+         return
+     
+     service.monitor_and_recover()
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     main() 
```

```diff
+ class VRStartupManager:
+     def __init__(self):

+     def find_application_paths(self):
+         """ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ãƒ‘ã‚¹ã‚’æ¤œç´¢"""
+         found = {}

+     def is_process_running(self, process_name):

+         try:
+             for proc in psutil.process_iter(['pid', 'name']):
+                 if process_name.lower() in proc.info['name'].lower():
+                     return True
+             return False
+         except Exception as e:
+             logging.error(f"ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ã‚¹ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: {e}")
+             return False

+     def start_application(self, app_name, path, wait_for_process=None):
+         """ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’èµ·å‹•"""

+     def startup_sequence(self):

+         # èµ·å‹•é…å»¶

+         for i in tqdm(range(self.startup_delay), desc="èµ·å‹•å¾…æ©Ÿ", leave=False):

+         success_count = 0

+                         success_count += 1
+                         time.sleep(5)  # Steamèµ·å‹•å¾Œå°‘ã—å¾…æ©Ÿ
+                         break
+                     else:
+                         logging.warning(f"Steamèµ·å‹•è©¦è¡Œ {attempt + 1}/{self.retry_attempts} å¤±æ•—")

+                 success_count += 1

+                             break
+                         else:
+                             logging.warning(f"SteamVRèµ·å‹•è©¦è¡Œ {attempt + 1}/{self.retry_attempts} å¤±æ•—")

+         return success_count == total_apps

+     def install_startup_service(self):
+         """Windowsèµ·å‹•æ™‚ã®è‡ªå‹•å®Ÿè¡Œã‚’è¨­å®š"""
+         try:
+             # ç¾åœ¨ã®ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆãƒ‘ã‚¹

+             key_path = r"SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run"
```

---

æ¬¡ã«ã€ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ¼ç”¨ã®ãƒãƒƒãƒãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ï¼š

```diff
- 
+ @echo off
+ chcp 65001 > nul
+ echo ===============================================
+ echo      VRç’°å¢ƒã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ¼
+ echo ===============================================
+ echo.
+ 
+ echo ğŸ”§ Pythonä¾å­˜é–¢ä¿‚ã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ä¸­...
+ py -3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt
```

### ğŸ® VRChatè‡ªå‹•èµ·å‹•æ©Ÿèƒ½

```diff
+     def should_attempt_recovery(self, process_name):
+         """å¾©æ—§ã‚’è©¦è¡Œã™ã¹ãã‹ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯"""
+         current_time = time.time()
+         
+         if process_name not in self.recovery_attempts:
+             self.recovery_attempts[process_name] = {
+                 'count': 0,
+                 'last_attempt': 0
+             }
+         
+         attempt_info = self.recovery_attempts[process_name]
+         
+         if current_time - attempt_info['last_attempt'] < self.recovery_cooldown:
+             return False
+         
+         if attempt_info['count'] >= self.max_recovery_attempts:
+             if current_time - attempt_info['last_attempt'] > 3600:
+                 attempt_info['count'] = 0
+             else:
+                 return False
+         
+         return True
+     
+     def record_recovery_attempt(self, process_name):

+             }
+         
+         self.recovery_attempts[process_name]['count'] += 1
+         self.recovery_attempts[process_name]['last_attempt'] = current_time
+     
+     def check_and_recover_vr_environment(self):
+         """VRç’°å¢ƒå…¨ä½“ã®ç›£è¦–ã¨å¾©æ—§"""
+         processes = self.get_vr_processes_status()
+         recovery_performed = False
+         
+         # Virtual Desktopç›£è¦–
+         if not processes['VirtualDesktop.Streamer'] and 'VirtualDesktop' in self.found_paths:
+             if self.should_attempt_recovery('VirtualDesktop.Streamer'):
+                 logging.warning("Virtual Desktop StreamerãŒåœæ­¢ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚å¾©æ—§ã‚’è©¦è¡Œä¸­...")
+                 
+                 if self.restart_application('VirtualDesktop'):
+                     logging.info("âœ… Virtual Desktop Streamerã®å¾©æ—§ã«æˆåŠŸã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+                     recovery_performed = True
+                 else:
+                     logging.error("âŒ Virtual Desktop Streamerã®å¾©æ—§ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+                 
+                 self.record_recovery_attempt('VirtualDesktop.Streamer')
+         
+         # SteamVRç›£è¦–
+         if not processes['SteamVR'] and 'SteamVR' in self.found_paths:
+             if self.should_attempt_recovery('SteamVR'):
+                 logging.warning("SteamVRãŒåœæ­¢ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚å¾©æ—§ã‚’è©¦è¡Œä¸­...")
+                 
+                 if not self.is_process_running('Steam'):
+                     if self.restart_application('Steam'):
+                         time.sleep(10)
+                 
+                 if self.restart_application('SteamVR'):
+                     logging.info("âœ… SteamVRã®å¾©æ—§ã«æˆåŠŸã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+                     recovery_performed = True
+                 else:
+                     logging.error("âŒ SteamVRã®å¾©æ—§ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+                 
+                 self.record_recovery_attempt('SteamVR')
+         
+         # Steamç›£è¦–
+         if not processes['Steam'] and 'Steam' in self.found_paths and 'SteamVR' in self.found_paths:
+             if self.should_attempt_recovery('Steam'):
+                 logging.warning("SteamãŒåœæ­¢ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚å¾©æ—§ã‚’è©¦è¡Œä¸­...")
+                 
+                 if self.restart_application('Steam'):
+                     logging.info("âœ… Steamã®å¾©æ—§ã«æˆåŠŸã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+                     recovery_performed = True
+                 else:
+                     logging.error("âŒ Steamã®å¾©æ—§ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+                 
+                 self.record_recovery_attempt('Steam')
+         
+         # VRChatç›£è¦–ï¼ˆSteamVRãŒèµ·å‹•ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹å ´åˆã®ã¿ï¼‰
+         if 'VRChat' in self.found_paths and processes['SteamVR']:
+             if not processes['VRChat']:
+                 if self.should_attempt_recovery('VRChat'):
+                     logging.warning("VRChatãŒåœæ­¢ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚å¾©æ—§ã‚’è©¦è¡Œä¸­...")
+

+                         logging.info("âœ… VRChatã®å¾©æ—§ã«æˆåŠŸã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+                         recovery_performed = True
+                     else:
+                         logging.error("âŒ VRChatã®å¾©æ—§ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+                     
+                     self.record_recovery_attempt('VRChat')
+         
+         return recovery_performed
+     
+     def monitor_and_recover(self):
+         """ç›£è¦–ã¨è‡ªå‹•å¾©æ—§ã®ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ—"""
+         logging.info("VRè‡ªå‹•å¾©æ—§ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã‚’é–‹å§‹ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+         logging.info(f"ç›£è¦–å¯¾è±¡ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³: {list(self.found_paths.keys())}")
+         
+         self.monitoring_active = True
+         
+         try:
+             while self.monitoring_active:
+                 processes = self.get_vr_processes_status()
+                 
+                 recovery_performed = self.check_and_recover_vr_environment()
+                 
+                 running_processes = [name for name, status in processes.items() if status]
+                 if running_processes:
+                     logging.info(f"å®Ÿè¡Œä¸­ã®VRãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ã‚¹: {', '.join(running_processes)}")
+                 else:
+                     logging.warning("å®Ÿè¡Œä¸­ã®VRãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚»ã‚¹ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“")
+                 
+                 if recovery_performed:
+                     logging.info("å¾©æ—§å‡¦ç†ãŒå®Ÿè¡Œã•ã‚Œã¾ã—ãŸã€‚10ç§’å¾Œã«å†ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã—ã¾ã™...")
+                     time.sleep(10)
+                     continue
+                 
+                 for i in tqdm(range(self.check_interval), desc="æ¬¡å›ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã¾ã§", leave=False):
+                     if not self.monitoring_active:
+                         break
+                     time.sleep(1)
+                 
+         except KeyboardInterrupt:
+             logging.info("VRè‡ªå‹•å¾©æ—§ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã‚’åœæ­¢ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ")
+         except Exception as e:
+             logging.error(f"äºˆæœŸã—ãªã„ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: {e}")
+         finally:
+             self.monitoring_active = False
+     
+     def stop_monitoring(self):
+         """ç›£è¦–ã‚’åœæ­¢"""
+         self.monitoring_active = False
+
```
